TopicTitle: Played for a week now. Amazing game but...

Articles.Content: I been playing ksp for a week now, and this game rly hits my sweetspot!  Who knew space could be this exiting!?  I landed on 2 moons. And started mining with my first rover on mun.  But game starts crashing more and more.  And my quik save game get reverted waaay back :s I rly hope there is some solution ,patch or other way soon!  Cuse whene u built the "perfekt rocket" 5 times and lost it.  It sucks tbh.... What makes it crash?  Ram?  Its not heat cuse my xbox is cooled with good external cooling.  Dear creators plz find a way to fix this
